de.iabg.mesh.event
Class NodeKeyItemListener

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.mesh.event.NodeKeyItemListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener
public class NodeKeyItemListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener

This ItemListener updates the log of the JMeshPanel whenever a set is selected.

Version:
September 26, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
